channel.title: CS 443 — Compiler Construction
channel.description: Learn how compilers work by building one!

item.title: <sc>Clojure</sc> guide ready.
item.description:
The guide to Clojure is now ready. There are two versions:

  • color
  • black/white

item.title: What's Going On?
item.description:
On the off chance that you are looking at the CS 443 site during the break, you will see that I am starting to add content to the site. This is the first time the course has been taught in this form, so everything is being built from scratch. Feel free to check back on this page to see how things are progressing, and if you have any suggestions please let me know. (This even includes topics covered and order of lectures!)

As for the tech, I am abandoning my custom-written CMS code and using Jekyll so I can spend more time on content and less on administration.

Enjoy!
